description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; alterations to existing single storey rear extension fenestration; removal of door from side/rear extension (Retrospective Application)
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: By way of its design, scale and siting, the alteration of roof from hip to gable end and the rear roof extension is not considered to be in keeping with the pattern of surrounding development, and harmful to the character of the area and wider Cuckoo Estate Conservation Area. As such, the proposal would be contrary to Policy D1 & D4 of the London Plan (2021), 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and the Cuckoo Estate Conservation Area Management Plan (2007) and Addendum (2023).
